data.text: Thank you for amazing service Pushparaj, Abhinav and Supu. We enjoyed a lot and food was amazing. Thanks as well to Suresh for amazing service at the by the bay. We will definitely come back. Staff are amazing ü§©. The view at by the bay is beautiful.
data.title: Amazing experience at Hatta Restaurant and at By the Bay. We will definitely come back here and we will recommend to all

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Roving05208044681, 

Thank you for taking the time to share your wonderful experience with us! We are delighted to hear that you had an amazing dining experience at Hatta Restaurant and By the Bay.

Your kind words regarding the service provided by Pushparaj, Abhinav, Supu, and Suresh are truly appreciated. We will be sure to pass on your compliments to them as recognition for their exceptional service.

It's fantastic to know that you enjoyed the delicious food and the beautiful view at By the Bay. We are grateful for your recommendation and look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable experience.

Warm regards,
Goran S, General Manager
owner_response.author: Goran Stojkovic

Your special mention of Pushparaj, Abhinav, Supu, and Suresh from the pool bar is greatly appreciated. We will be sure to pass on your kind words to them as recognition for their exceptional service.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Explorer53493523119, 

Thank you for your glowing review and for choosing to stay with us! We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed exemplary service during your time at our hotel.

It's wonderful to know that you appreciated the food, ambiance, and the friendly service provided by Pushparaj, Abhinav, Supu, and Suresh from the pool bar. We will be sure to pass on your kind words to them.

We are grateful for your recommendation and look forward to welcoming you back soon. 

Warm regards,
Goran S, General Manager

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Maps08587363739, 

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed the delicious food and the calm, pleasant atmosphere during your visit.

It's wonderful to know that our staff members, including Pushparaj, Abhinav, Supu, and Suresh, provided you with respectful and attentive service. We will be sure to pass on your kind words to them.

We take pride in maintaining a clean and well-arranged environment for our guests, and we are pleased to hear that you appreciated it.

Thank you once again for your kind comments. We look forward to welcoming you back for another enjoyable experience in the future.

Warm regards,
Goran S, General Manager

data.text: Suresh by the bay, has been amazing, super helpful, friendly & knowledgeable - excellent service & thankfully informed us about the barbecue which was our best meal across Italy & Dubai. I would definitely rate him 20 of of 10 as he definitely adds value to this beautiful hotel
data.title: By the bay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 344tarryns, 

Thank you for your fantastic review!

We are delighted to hear that Suresh provided you with exceptional service during your stay. It's wonderful to know that he went above and beyond to ensure you had a memorable experience, and we will be sure to pass along your kind words to him.

Your feedback means a lot to us, and we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back to our beautiful hotel soon!

Warm regards,
Goran S, General Manager
